text: Blackslough is a forest and former village on a hill near Wincanton in Somerset. The area has also been called, Blackslough Wood, or Black Slough.https://getoutside.ordnancesurvey.co.uk/local/blackslough-wood-south- somerset Viewed on 07/07/2022 In the wood their used to be a farm called Blackslough Farm and a lodge called Blackslough Lodge. Blackslough is now deserted and nobody lives there, there is also almost no proof that the settlement existed. Blackslough is near the mouth of a small stream. The area is now filled with paths, fences and a gate to the former farmland. == Demographics == === Population Change over Time === ==== Total Population ==== Total Population Year Population +/- Previous % +/- Next % Source 1841 3 N/A N/A -14 367% 1851 17 +14 +82% -5 29% 1861 22 +5 +23% 0 0% 1871 22 0 0% +8 64% 1891 14 -8 57% +14 100% 2021 0 -14 N/A N/A N/A === Population by Gender and Marital Status over Time === ==== Total Population ==== Total Population Year Total Male Female Married Unmarried Widowed Source 1841 3 1 2 2 1 0 Pdf: https://www.wiltshire- opc.org.uk/Items/Stourton/Stourton%20-%20Census%201841.pdf Viewed on 15/07/2022 1851 17 8 9 4 6 3 Pdf:https://www.wiltshire- opc.org.uk/Items/Stourton/Stourton%20-%20Census%201851.pdf Viewed on 15/07/2022 1861 22 11 11 8 12 2 Pdf:https://www.wiltshire- opc.org.uk/Items/Stourton/Stourton%20-%20Census%201861.pdf Viewed on 15/07/2022 1871 22 11 11 8 12 2 Pdf:https://www.wiltshire- opc.org.uk/Items/Stourton/Stourton%20-%20Census%201871.pdf Viewed on 15/07/2022 1891 14 8 6 6 8 0 Pdf:https://www.wiltshire- opc.org.uk/Items/Stourton/Stourton%20-%20Census%201891.pdf Viewed on 15/07/2022 2021 0 0 0 0 0 0 ==== Blackslough ==== Blackslough Year Total Male Female Married Unmarried Widowed Source 1841 3 1 2 2 1 0 1851 15 7 8 4 5 2 1861 17 9 8 6 9 2 1871 20 10 10 8 11 1 1891 5 2 3 2 3 0 2021 0 0 0 0 0 0 ==== Blackslough Lodge ==== Blackslough Lodge Year Total Male Female Married Unmarried Widowed Source 1841 0 0 0 0 0 0 1851 2 1 1 0 1 1 1861 5 2 3 2 3 0 1871 2 1 1 0 1 1 1891 6 4 2 2 4 0 2021 0 0 0 0 0 0 ==== Blackslough Farm ==== Blackslough Farm Year Total Male Female Married Unmarried Widowed Source 1841 0 0 0 0 0 0 1851 0 0 0 0 0 0 1861 0 0 0 0 0 0 1871 0 0 0 0 0 0 1891 3 2 1 2 1 0 2021 0 0 0 0 0 0 == References == Category:Villages in Somerset
